20101216165308.000|20101216165310.000|CCO|IT'S HARDER FOR THEM TO TRAIN, 
20101216165310.000|20101216165312.000|CCO|IT'S HARDER FOR THEM TO PLOT AND
20101216165312.000|20101216165313.667|CCO|LAUNCH ATTACKS.
